pages.text: These dogs were originally bred to hunt boars, though they also served as guardian dogs.$(br2)Standing at over a black tall, these proud dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in old growth forests. They can also be found in some badlands and more rarely in meadows.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Bacon Treat.
